sentence.Network_en: A weathercock and an artful person, he spoke a lot of beautiful words to please people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这个人,见风使舵,八面玲珑,说了不少使大家高兴的话.

sentence.Network_en: A high weathercock frequency is essential for the stability of the guidance loop.
sentence.Network_cn: 从制导回路的稳定性角度来看,短周期振荡频率高是基本的.

sentence.Network_en: I can't make any plans with you as changeable as a weathercock.
sentence.Network_cn: 你一会儿一个想法,我怎么订计划.
